id.description: UUID identifying this purchase order line

checkinItems.description: if true this will toggle the Check-in workflow for details associated with this PO line

agreementId.description: UUID of the agreement this purchase order line is related to

acquisitionMethod.description: UUID of the acquisition method for this purchase order line

automaticExport.description: if true then line will be marked as available to export in the EDIFACT format or other format

alerts.description: an array of alert record IDs

cancellationRestriction.description: whether or not there are cancellation restrictions for this purchase order line

cancellationRestrictionNote.description: free-form notes related to cancellation restrictions

collection.description: whether or not this purchase order line is for a collection

contributors.description: list of contributors to the material

donor.description: the donor contributing to this purchase order line

fundDistribution.description: Fund distribution records for this purchase order line

instanceId.description: UUID of the instance record this purchase order line is related to

isPackage.description: Indicates that this POL is for a package

locations.description: Location records for this purchase order line

lastEDIExportDate.description: The last date when line was exported in the EDIFACT file

packagePoLineId.description: UUID referencing the poLine that represents the package that this POLs title belongs to

paymentStatus.description: The purchase order line payment status

poLineNumber.description: A human readable number assigned to this PO line

receiptDate.description: date the purchase order line was received

receiptStatus.description: The purchase order line receipt status

reportingCodes.description: a list of reporting codes associated with this purchase order line

requester.description: who requested this purchase order line

rush.description: whether or not this is a rush order

source.description: the source of this purchase order line

tags.description: arbitrary tags associated with this purchase order line
